Originally built for big-box retail use, 420 West Morris Street is a highly flexible, open floor plan building offering excellent exposure to the regional traffic corridor of I-86 (The Southern Tier Expressway).  The property is suitable for a variety of retail, office or industrial uses and is situated in the Village of Bath, which serves as the county seat for Steuben County, making it the commercial and business focal point for the region. A bank outparcel leased by Chemung Canal Trust Company (410 West Morris St) is also available as a separate offering.
+ 420 West Morris Street: 61,205 Square Feet, Built in 1980, Fully Sprinklered
+ 410 West Morris Street: 2,385 Square Feet, Built in 1990, Leased to Chemung County Trust Co.
+ 6.99 Acres Total, Comprised of Three Parcels:
  + 158.07-01-030.104 (Kmart, 6.01 Acres)
  + 158.07-01-030.106 (Bank, 0.38 Acres)
  + 158.07-01-030.105 (Land, 0.60 Acres)
+ Abundant Parking
+ Zoning: General Commercial, Village of Bath
+ Located on a regional traffic corridor (I-86) approx. 3 miles east of interchange with I-390
High visibility site with neighboring businesses including: Dollar General; Tractor Supply Co.; Save-A-Lot; McDonalds; Arbys; and Microtel
Sale Price: $1,400,000 (Former Kmart)
$700,000 (Chemung Bank)
Lease Rate: Negotiable (Former Kmart Only)

Nestled on the North shore of Canandaigua Lake in the heart of Upstate New Yorks Finger Lakes Region, Pinnacle North is a 21 acre, $120 million mixed-use development.  The development will consist of:
+ 450 Residential Units
+ 35,000 Square Feet of Retail /Commercial Space

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Phase I includes 135 Apartment Units (Rental Rate of ~$2/SF) and 23,000 square feet of retail space.  The following opportunities for commercial space are available:

AVAILABLE - 6,300 square feet of ground floor retail space in a 4-story building (residences on upper floors)

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located in suburban Rochester, New York, Perinton Hills Shopping Center is 70,000 square foot mixed use multi-building development.  The property is directly across from and shares a traffic light with the recently renovated Wegmans.  Current tenants consist of a complementary mix of medical, retail and service-based tenants.  Notable on-site tenants include a freestanding Taco Bell, a full-service Bank of America branch (under construction), Walgreens, Aldi, Club Pilates and Pediatric Urgent Care.  Excellent opportunities exist for traditional retail and service-based tenants.  The Property is surrounded by newly constructed apartments and is afforded excellent walkability due to newly created sidewalks.

+ Multiple suites ranging from 287-6,474 square feet.
+ Suitable for either retail or office use.
+ Highly accessible location and visible from the I-490 / I-590 Interchange.
+ Adjacent to LA Fitness

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Centrally located on a high visibility corner, this former restaurant site offers a prime redevelopment opportunity in the Town of Henrietta.  Alternative potential uses may be accommodated including retail, office or medical and the property owner is willing to entertain a variety of lease structures including a ground lease, new build-to-suit construction, or reuse of the existing building

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located in suburban Rochester, New York, Ridgecrest Commons is an 86,000 square foot retail plaza located immediately off of I-390 at the gateway to the 2.5+ million square foot West Ridge Road trade area.  Current tenants include Ashleys Furniture, Five Guys, Outback Steakhouse, and Petsaver.  Significant enhancements are planned for the exterior facade.  End Cap space and a Development Pad are currently available.
